attributes.action: Stop Wales and Scotland creating sanctuary cities that bypass UK immigration law
attributes.additional_details:
Asylum seekers and migrants must register in the first safe country they reach, as per the Dublin agreement, and in line with 
international law. This is clearly not in Wales or Scotland.

Devolved administrations must abide by UK immigration laws and not 
be aloud to circumvent them. After what happened in Parsons Green 
there is too much of a terror risk to bring these migrants in.
attributes.background:
Calling on the UK government to oppose and stop all attempts by the Welsh and Scottish governments to create so called sanctuary cities.

Asylum seekers and migrants must register in the first safe country 
they reach, as per the Dublin agreement, which is not Wales or Scotland.
